name: tiffin-wale
description: TiffinMate - A comprehensive food delivery platform

scripts.install:all: pnpm install && pnpm install:backend && pnpm install:frontend && pnpm install:mobile && pnpm install:partner && pnpm install:admin
scripts.mobile: cd interface/student-app && pnpm dlx expo start
scripts.partner: cd interface/partner-app && pnpm dlx expo start
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "pnpm run backend:dev" "pnpm run frontend:dev" "pnpm run mobile:dev" "pnpm run partner:dev" "pnpm run admin:dev"
scripts.dev:web: concurrently "pnpm run backend:dev" "pnpm run frontend:dev" "pnpm run admin:dev"
scripts.dev:mobile: concurrently "pnpm run backend:dev" "pnpm run mobile:dev" "pnpm run partner:dev"
scripts.build:all: concurrently "pnpm run backend:build" "pnpm run frontend:build" "pnpm run admin:build"
scripts.deploy:backend: cd monolith_backend && gcloud app deploy app.yaml
scripts.deploy:frontend: cd interface/official-web-app && pnpm run build:gcloud && gcloud app deploy app.yaml
scripts.deploy:mobile: cd interface/student-app && pnpm run build:gcloud && gcloud app deploy app.yaml
scripts.deploy:partner: cd interface/partner-app && pnpm run build:gcloud && gcloud app deploy app.yaml
scripts.deploy:admin: cd interface/super-admin-web && pnpm run build && gcloud app deploy app.yaml
scripts.deploy:all: pnpm run deploy:backend && pnpm run deploy:frontend && pnpm run deploy:mobile && pnpm run deploy:partner && pnpm run deploy:admin && gcloud app deploy dispatch.yaml
scripts.clean: pnpm run clean:modules && pnpm run clean:build
scripts.clean:build: find . -name 'dist' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find . -name 'build' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find . -name '.next' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' +
scripts.test:all: concurrently "pnpm run backend:test" "cd interface/student-app && pnpm test"
scripts.lint: concurrently "pnpm run backend:lint" "pnpm run mobile:lint" "pnpm run partner:lint" "pnpm run admin:lint"
